press_toggle_button.description: Press the toggle button to control the lamp

rotate_toggle_button.description: Rotate the toggle button to adjust the lamp brightness

rotate_head.description: Rotate the lamp's head to adjust the light direction

clean_lamp_base.description: Wipe the lamp base to clean it

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to ensure its smooth operation

clean_entire_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the lamp base, head, and the toggle button.
